issue.title: [C++] Add hash kernel benchmarks, investigate faster alternative non-SIMD hash functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1823](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1823). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1823?focusedCommentId=16693389) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Hash-kernel benchmarks already exist in `compute-benchmark.cc`, I'm not sure more are needed?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1823?focusedCommentId=16693564) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Closing. Your hashing PR today addresses my goal here (to improve the performance of hashing)
